description: Public roads under local (city/county) jurisdiction that are functionally identified as local. Does not contain major roads or highways. Contains data on size of road, length, type, etc. Fields include average daily traffic counts, locations of count stations, if it is congested, if maintenance is under shared jurisdiction and the year it was built or last updated, political jurisdictions, and more.

name: Colorado Local Roads
